column1: "Set a goal to exercise for 30 minutes every day this week."
"Agree on a goal to eat at least one serving of vegetables with every meal."
"Set a goal to limit screen time to one hour per day."
"Agree on a goal to drink at least 8 glasses of water each day."
"Set a goal to meditate for 10 minutes every morning."
"Agree on a goal to walk 10,000 steps per day."
"Set a goal to read for 30 minutes before bed each night."
"Agree on a goal to practice gratitude by writing down three things you're thankful for each day."
"Set a goal to limit alcohol consumption to one drink per day."
"Agree on a goal to prioritize self-care by taking a relaxing bath once a week."
